oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Men and women picking cotton
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This photograph features a group of men and women picking cotton in Ripley, Tennessee.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Looking Back at Tennessee Photograph Collection, 1890-1981
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cotton; Cotton farmers
